description.lang: 1.Minus & Minimal design suitable for high class kitchen interior2.Plug-in parts for easy installation3.Precise gas leakage detection assures safety4.Prevents malfunction perfectly with dual electronic fire monitoring control5.Anticorrosive stainless temperature sensor with high sensitivity6.Excellent dual disaster prevention system and wide protection area (0.6m2)7.Power saving electronic gas valve 8.By using this application, you can check the conditions and use smartfunctions such as valve control and timer alarm.
